original_text: then the priest shall examine him, and if the itch has spread in the skin, the priest need not seek for the yellow hair; he is unclean.
korean_text: 제사장은 그를 진찰할지니 과연 옴이 피부에 퍼졌으면 누른 털을 찾을 것 없이 그는 부정하니라

sentences.original_text: then the priest shall examine him
and if the itch has spread in the skin
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 만약 그 피부에 가려움이 퍼졌다면

sentences.original_text: the priest need not seek for the yellow hair
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 노란 털을 찾을 필요가 없습니다
